subject: Harness Racing
Hambletonian (Harness Race)
lead_paragraph: George Brennan, who became only the second driver to win the Hambletonian and Hambletonian Oaks on the same day, won his second straight harness driver of the year award.
snippet: George Brennan, who became only the second driver to win the Hambletonian and Hambletonian Oaks on the same day, won his second straight harness driver of the year award.
